actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the appointment of Colonel Mary Agnes Hallaren, United States Army, retired, to the grade of brigadier general on the Retired List of the United States Army.

summary.text: Authorizes the appointment of a certain individual to the grade of brigadier general on the Retired List of the United States Army.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appointment of Colonel Mary Agnes Hallaren, United States Army, retired, to the grade of brigadier general on the Retired List of the United States Army.
